mapper.update: update sys_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regist_time = #{registTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, nickname, age, last_login_ip, last_login_time, is_delete, regist_time from sys_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, username, password, nickname, age, last_login_ip, last_login_time, is_delete, regist_time from sys_user
